entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo I can’t believe you even have the Balls to say that. The state of NY was one of the first states to get hit with COVID-19 due the fact that they are an international travel hub for the world. No one in the WH sent any advanced warnings out of the pandemic spread & played it down.
